prompt:
['in older patients with primary advanced breast cancer, and that the expected benefits of the intervention', 'exceed the estimated limited risks for patients involved.', '10 Clinical perspectives and implementation', 'With the aging population and expected increase of cancer incidence (especially among older people),', 'new approaches of early rehabilitation are needed to maintain physical function levels and independence', 'in older cancer patients. The TOLCA - Breast Cancer Exercise study has the potential to become a new', 'model of early rehabilitation care for older patients with breast cancer. In the long term, it is our goal to', "investigate the program's effect among older patients with various malignancies in order to map out the", 'effects, common features, and the differences across cancers, with an overall focus on the older cancer', 'population. The TOLCA - Breast Cancer Exercise study supports the development of future health', 'promotion guidelines for older cancer patients during anti-cancer treatment by reducing the complex', 'symptom burden, supporting treatment tolerance, maintaining physical function and thereby enabling a', 'better quality of life. The interventions pragmatic approach and integration in the hospital and home-', 'setting will be implementable should the study prove effective and implementation is the goal.', '33', 'Protocol TOLCA - Breast Cancer Exercise v8 18.06.2018']['11 References', 'Appendix 1: Performance status', 'The Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (also known as the WHO or the', 'Zubrod score). The ECOG performance score runs from 0-5, with 0 denoting good health with an', 'independent and active lifestyle, and 5 death.', 'ECOG performance status*', 'Grade', 'ECOG', '0', 'Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction.', '1', 'Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work', 'of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work.', '2', 'Ambulatory and capable of all self-care but unable to carry out any work activities.', 'Up and about more than 50% of waking hours.', '3', 'Capable of only limited self-care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking', 'hours.', '4', 'Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any self-care. Totally confined to bed or chair.', '5', 'Dead', '* Oken MM, Creech RH, Tormey DC, et al. Toxicity and response criteria of The Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group.', 'Am J ClinOncol 1982; 5: 649-655.', 'Kraeftens Bekaempelse (Danish version)*', "Kraeftens Bekaempelses version af 'performance status'", 'Score', 'Status', '0', 'Fuldt aktiv som for man blev syg.', '1', 'Kan ikke udfore tungt fysisk arbejde, men alt andet.', '2', 'Oppegaende mere end halvdelen af dagen og selvhjulpen, men ude af stand til at', 'udfore fysisk arbejde.', '3', 'I seng eller siddende i stol mere end halvdelen af dagen, og brug for hjaelp til at klare', 'sig selv.', '4', 'Bundet til seng eller stol og har brug for hjaelp til alt.', '*', 'Kraeftens Bekaempelse. From: https://www.cancer.dk/hjaelp-viden/fakta-om-', 'kraeft/ordbog/performance-status/', '34', 'Protocol TOLCA - Breast Cancer Exercise v8 18.06.2018']['Appendix 2: Patient questionnaire (Danish)', 'Deltageroplysninger', 'Kaere deltager i TOLCA- - Bryst Kraeft Traenings studiet.', 'Du bedes venligst udfylde nedenstäende spørgeskema og returnere det til den projektansvarlige', 'fysioterapeut (Ida Lundager).', 'Fodselsdato (DD.MM.ÄR):', 'Mand', 'Kvinde', 'Hvilket land er du fodt i?', 'Hvad er din civilstatus?', 'Gift / samboende', 'Enlig/enke/enkemand', 'Hvad er det hojeste uddannelsesniveau du har gennemfort?', 'Mindre end 9. klasse', '9. eller 10. klasse (folkeskole)', 'Gymnasial uddannelse', 'Erhvervsuddannelse/faglig uddannelse', 'Kort videregaende uddannelse (under 3 ar)', 'Mellemlang videregaende uddannelse (3-4 = ar)', 'Lang videregaende uddannelse (5 àr og derover)', 'Hvad er din beskzeftigelsessituation?', 'ensionist/efterlonsmodtager', 'Lønmodtager i arbejde eller selvstaendig', 'Sygedagpenge/revalidering', 'Arbejdslos', 'Ryger du?', 'Ja, jeg ryger dagligt', 'Ja, men kun til festlige lejligheder', 'Nej, jeg har aldrig røget', 'Nej, men jeg har tidligere roget', 'Hvis du er aktiv ryger, svar sá venligst pa folgende:', '-', 'Hvor mange cigaretter ryger du dagligt?', '-', 'Hvis du ryger andet end cigaretter, angiv hvilket her:', ', samt antal gram', 'dagligt', '-', 'I hvor mange ar har du røget?', '35', 'Protocol TOLCA - Breast Cancer Exercise v8 18.06.2018']
